channel.title: CheckMirrors
channel.description: checkmirrors school of motoring. Learn to drive in Yorkshire. Driving lessons from qualified instructors. First 3 lessons only £39. Pass plus options. York and Leeds.

item.title: Congratulations to Seb Swenson who passed on 4 January 2017 with Sarah. First time with 11 minor faults
item.description: Seb said: “Experienced, knowledgeable, helpful and honest. I had a great instructor that helped both my wife and I pass our tests and it was well with every penny. I don’t think “thanks” is enough to convey the level of appreciation I’m feeling right now, but the contribution of tough love, honest feedback and patience was just what I needed to pass. Thanks so much for everything. I’d recommend the company and my instructor particularly to anyone looking to learn or just refresh”
